sentences.en: ...a pledge not to raise taxes on people below a certain income.
sentences.cn: …一个对收入低于一定水平的人不提高税收的承诺。

sentences.en: By his own admission, he evaded taxes as a Florida real-estate speculator.
sentences.cn: 他亲口承认自己在佛罗里达从事房地产投机生意时逃过税。

sentences.en: It's amazing what people will do to get out of paying taxes.
sentences.cn: 人们为逃税而做出的种种事情令人吃惊。

sentences.en: Newcomers had to pay far more in taxes than long-time land owners.
sentences.cn: 新的土地业主比老业主缴纳的税款要多很多。

sentences.en: Overnight return flights cost from £349 including airport taxes.
sentences.cn: 当夜返程的航班至少需要349英镑，包括机场税。

sentences.en: Rest assured, if you owe taxes, we will collect them.
sentences.cn: 不用多想，如果你欠税，我们会去收的。

sentences.en: Revenues from "green taxes" could then be channelled back into energy efficiency.
sentences.cn: 从“绿色税收”得来的收入便可回过头来用于提高能效。

sentences.en: The main sticking point was the question of taxes.
sentences.cn: 主要的症结是税收问题。

sentences.en: The President's flip-flops on taxes made him appear indecisive.
sentences.cn: 总统在税收问题上的一再反复使他显得优柔寡断。

sentences.en: The taxman caught up with him and demanded £7,000 in unpaid taxes.
sentences.cn: 税收人员查到了他，要求他把未缴纳的7,000英镑税款交上。

sentences.en: The wealthier may have to pay a little more in taxes.
sentences.cn: 更富有的人可能得多缴一点儿税。

sentences.en: There would be no new taxes under his leadership.
sentences.cn: 在他主政期间不会增加新税种。

sentences.en: They were made to pay $8.8 million in taxes.
sentences.cn: 他们被迫缴纳880万美元的税款。

sentences.en: Though off-puttingly complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentences.cn: 虽然地税在细节上复杂得要命，但在本质上却很简单。

sentences.en: To make the books balance, spending must fall and taxes must rise.
sentences.cn: 为了使收支相等，必须减少支出，增加税收。

sentences.en: We all know that cheating on our taxes is a no-no.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道偷逃税是绝对不行的。

trans.tran_cn: 税，税额( tax的名词复数 )，整复法，排序( taxis的名词复数 )，出租汽车( taxi的名词复数 )，赋税
trans.tran_en: Tax is an amount of money that you have to pay to the government so that it can pay for public services such as road and schools
